name: Grand Strokers
description:
In this horror-themed comedic RPG, you are "Hero" (but can change your name) that tries to stop a horned-up vampire named "The Grand Stroker" and his electrifying friends. You will fight enemies, level up and get progressively stronger tiered gear, take on dungeons and hand-drawn bosses until the final show-down where you will fight the "The Grand Stroker" himself in the Grand Stroker's Castle. Will you survive --- or will he suck your life-forces dry?

The game features :

•Hilarious names, places and ideas that will literally say "Are you kidding me?!"

•Hand drawn bosses from Cesare, the legendary Italian illustrator from NecroCatic Games!!

•At least 7 dungeons and a dozen bosses!

•A ton of color tiered gear to collect including rare, epic and MONSTER drops!

•Traditional turn-based combat with new and clearly superior Retro Sideview Combat!

•Some BANGING Music by returning OST composer Scott Oakes (who did "The Tower of Wowers")!!

•Masterful voice actor VaughnsEvilLair providing funny and witty lines that will sure to leave you in stiches.

•Ideas from the same programmer and studio that brought you such classic games as "The Tower of Wowers" and "CarsFuckingDragons".

AND MORE!!!
